Saves the deep link configuration settings for the portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"deepLinkSettings":{"type":"object","properties":{"handlingMode":{"enum":[0,1,2],"type":"integer","description":"The deep link handling mode.","format":"int32","title":"DeepLinkHandlingMode"},"lastModified":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The deep link settings.","title":"TenantDeepLinkSettings"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for managing the deep link configuration.","title":"DeepLinkConfigurationRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
